attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: A boolean value indicating whether the control is disabled

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: A boolean value indicating whether the control should consider empty values valid

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: The color

attributes.name: has-errors
attributes.description:
Contains a public value to indicate if the model has any errors
that would prevent saving it.

attributes.name: instanceid
attributes.description:
Contains a unique identifier for when we have multiple instances of the editor.
For example when we want to show an items data as well as an items properties.

Need to rethink this..would like it to be more generic.
We are currently tied to either data or props as this helps us know how to get the correct model from the store.

attributes.name: model
attributes.description: Contains the public model for this component.

attributes.name: original
attributes.description: Contains the original source item json as it was when the component was created.

attributes.name: translations
attributes.description: Contains the translations for this component.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description:
Contains the public value for this component.
This should be an item Id for one of the models in the store.

attributes.name: itemid
attributes.description: Contains the current solution item id

attributes.name: source-item-data
attributes.description: Contains the current solution item data

attributes.description: Contains the translations for this component.

attributes.description: Used to show/hide the content tree

attributes.name: group-id

The templates itemId.

attributes.name: translations
attributes.description: Contains the translations for this component.

attributes.name: default-wkid
attributes.description: The wkid that will be used as the default when no user selection has been made.

attributes.name: loaded
attributes.description:
Indicates if the control has been enabled.
The first time Spatial Reference has been enabled it should enable all feature services.

attributes.name: locked
attributes.description: When true, all but the main switch are disabled to prevent interaction.

attributes.description: Contains the translations for this component.

attributes.name: instanceid
attributes.description: This needs to be unique for props vs data of an item

attributes.name: is-resource
attributes.description:
Should be set to true for items that store their data as a resource
Will allow for upload and download of the resource

A templates itemId.
This is used to get the correct model from a store in the json-editor
